content.question: Which of the following best describes the phrase structure of the excerpt?

choices.label: two parallel periods with a HC in measure 8 and a PAC in measure 16
two parallel periods with a PAC in measure 8 and a PAC in measure 16
two contrasting periods with a HC in measure 8 and a PAC in measure 16
two contrasting periods with a PAC in measure 8 and a PAC in measure 16

content.answer: two contrasting periods with a PAC in measure 8 and a PAC in measure 16

skill.text: Skill 2.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in notated music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
